game.name: Sip Or Die
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A psychological party horror where every sip could kill you. Take a Gamble, and Choose a vial, drink, and pray it’s not poison.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A psychological party horror where every sip could kill you. Take a Gamble, and Choose a vial, drink, and pray it’s not poison.
